name: hpcc-js-tests
description: Test orchestrator for HPCC Visualization Framework - runs all test suites

scripts.test-all: npm run test-node-cjs && npm run test-node-esm && npm run test-browser-esm && npm run test-browser-umd && npm run test-type-leaks
scripts.test-node: npm run test-node-cjs && npm run test-node-esm
scripts.test-browser: npm run test-browser-esm && npm run test-browser-umd
scripts.test-node-cjs: cd node-cjs && npm install && npm test
scripts.test-node-esm: cd node-esm && npm install && npm test
scripts.test-browser-esm: cd browser-esm && npm install && npm test
scripts.test-browser-umd: cd browser-umd && npm install && npm test
scripts.test-type-leaks: cd type-leaks && npm install && npm test
scripts.install-all: npm run install-node && npm run install-browser && npm run install-type-leaks
scripts.install-node: cd node-cjs && npm install && cd ../node-esm && npm install
scripts.install-browser: cd browser-esm && npm install && cd ../browser-umd && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean-node && npm run clean-browser && npm run clean-type-leaks
scripts.clean-node: cd node-cjs && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../node-esm && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.clean-browser: cd browser-esm && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../browser-umd && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
